components.label: You wake up and realize you've been transported into a video game world! You can only choose ONE special ability. Which one do you pick?
components.name: which_superpower

options.label: Infinite Sprint
options.value: Infinite Sprint - You never get tired and you can run forever at top speed!

options.label: Inventory Magic
options.value: Inventory Magic - You can store anything in a limitless weightless backpack!

options.label: Save & Load
options.value: Save & Load - You can save your progress in life and reload if things go wrong!

options.label: Charisma Maxed
options.value: Charisma Maxed - Everyone likes you instantly and you always win arguments!

pages.title: Check your answers before sending your application

components.content:
Now send your application

By submitting this application you are confirming that, to the best of your knowledge, the details you are providing are correct.
